amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, an additional $45,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation for science and technology.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4477 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4477 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To make available, with an offset, an additional $45,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation for science and technology.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4477 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4477 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy.
